cause.description:
Hello, If you like Sons of Butcher support them here and help our, cause (guy in background yells "what cause?") well all i can really say is if 1000 people support i will breakdance and make a fool of myself in other ways at a dance.. and you will all love it..... Sons of Butcher is the shiznight!!!
1. Sons of Butcher should be worshipped
2. Sons of Butcher's meat is amazing
3. Sons of Butcher are ROCK GODS!!!!
cause.mission: Get as many followers of SOB as possible
cause.name: Support Sons of Butcher!!!
